body: Based on what they are saying, the dude/senpai appears to be Shiori-chan sexual partner before the MC, that explained why she doesn't act like a complete virgin when she was with the MC, and Shiori-chan is having one supposed final sex meet with him and the dude essentially said that should MC failed to satisfy her, she can comeback anytime.
